page_content: The page discusses the Digital Library Ostschweiz (Dibiost), a service for borrowing electronic media.
The page is about the GIS-Fachstelle, which deals with geoinformation and mentions the use of specific GIS software.
The page discusses Geographical Information Systems (GIS) and the role of the Amt f√ºr Geoinformation in managing geodata.
The page discusses guardianship measures for adults and the roles of professional and private guardians.
The page provides information on the tax valuation of securities, particularly stocks and bonds.
The page provides a guide on how to retrieve daily registry entries from the official Swiss Commercial Register website.
The page provides information on updating the AI-Tax 2022 software for tax declarations and offers guides for installation.
The page serves as an index for various topics covered by the Appenzell Innerrhoden administration, from Abfall (Waste) to Zivilschutz (Civil Protection).
The page discusses the history of hand embroidery in Appenzell Innerrhoden and the founding of the Stickerei-Zentrale Appenzell in 1930.
The page provides information on the construction and maintenance of heating systems, including guidelines for proper wood burning.
